ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Solo Spectre Camp Break?
ygData.msgSnippet: The first check on everything is against level.  It was not until 47 that I got good at pulling singles (from the PoF cave).  Other stuff already posted about
ygData.messageBody:
The first check on everything is against level. It was not until 47 that I
got good at pulling singles (from the PoF cave). Other stuff already posted
about harmony and lament too. But the rule of thumb is let the higher level
person pull. Granted, I have lamented froogs in seb and that let our level
59/60 puller get singles where he would get multiples w/o lament. But your
best bet is to have the higher level folks pulling.

Sylly Songsynger
(The Pantheon)
Troubador, somewhere on Innoruuk...
